name: Very Cool Painting Game!
description:
Like snake, but you leave a trail of your colour behind. Play against someone else to see who can colour the most squares in a minute. Speed boots spawn along with helpful dynamite, but also dangerous cactus - be careful where you go. You can customise the spawning rules and player names.

I made this game in under a week, no audio, but it's still quite playable.

Enjoy :D
